activities: 1) North Highland Holding Company and its subsidaries(collectively "North Highland")use personal information regarding current, former, and prospective partners and employees (collectively "Personnel") in connection with the Personnel relationship, such as in connection with the provision of services and benefits to Personnel and the promotion and delivery of services to clients and prospective clients. 2) North Highland uses personal information regarding clients and their personnel and customers in connection with the client relationship, such as the delivery of professional services and the administration of the client relationship. 3) North Highland uses personal information regarding third parties (such as service providers and contractors) and their personnel in connection with the management and administration of the business relationships with such third parties.
